reviews.review: It didnâ€™t disappoint and amazingly keeps the anticipation up for whatever comes next

I came in knowing this would be Marvel at the top of their game, but I was taken back by the end that they would have me understanding where the villain was coming from and siding with him. Thanos is the best villain since Heath Ledger's Joker in "The Dark Knight."
Too long and repetitive. Horrible ending.

This movie is amazing. I would totally recomend watching it. I want to rewatch it already. It is a perfect cumilation of 10 years of hard work. It is beautiful and sad at the same time. You could see how they listen to the fans. What are you still reading this for? Go watch it
It's the best movie of my life. 10/10

WTF is wrong with this movie, I had so many expectations and they just killed EVERYONE except the first avengers. STAR LORD RUINED EVERYTHING, DR STRANGE GAVE THANOS THE TIME STONE INSTEAD OF TELEPORTING SOMEWHERE AND USING IT TO REVERSE TIME, TELL STAR LORD GAMORA IS DEAD AND NOT TO FREAK OUT AND RUIN THE PLAN, GAMORA TOLD THANOS WHERE IS THE MIND STONE INSTEAD OF KILLING HERSELF ON THAT SUPER WEAPONIZED SHIP, AND MOST STUPID THING THAT HAPPENED: THANOS DIDNT DIE WHEN THOR CUT HIS CHEST IN HALF, I MEAN WHO WONT DIE TO THAT???? ANTMAN AND HAWKEYE DIDNT EVEN APPEAR AND VISION DIDNT DO ANYTHING!?!?! HE CAN BECOME A GHOST, FLY AND SHOOT DEVESTATING LASERS AND HE JUST  WAITED TO GET KILLED?!??!?!? And Wakanda has super high nano tech and they cant create a decent weapon?! ALL THIS MAKES NO SENSE ,THEY JUST RUINED A GREAT, EPIC MOVIE!

Way waaaaay too long.  I was ready for it to be over after an hour and a half.  It just drags on and on  for what seems like forever.  I'm not interested enough in what happens next to sit through another one like that

They only had to do one thing to make me love this movie: get Thanos, my favorite villain, right. And boy, did they ever. He's incredible, and has tons of screen time. Yes, the movie is overstuffed, which is to be expected, and yet the pacing is wonderful. I was never bored and always enthralled.
Incredible, I love it and more that unexpected ending because one believes that it will end with the same outcome that the heroes win and the villain dies. It's a drastic change for the MCU
